item.title: Need help makeing me a mod on my server!
item.dc:creator: @iqhacker iqhacker
item.description:
@iqhacker wrote:

Alright, well can you give us some more info please?

Like, what version server are you using?
Have you logged into MoparScape using the client so that your user file is created?
And what do you mean by: it doesnt work?
Tell me exactly what you did to edit the file, and then maybe I can help you further.

*EDIT: Oh yes and IcyPimp, I don’t think he needs to add the source code, because the code for PlayerRights is already in 3.2, he just has to change the value in his user file.

Also, I can’t even edit the source code because I don’t have the source code, just the compiled classes.

In reply to the above message, it would be nice if someone can give me a link to the source to HybridScape.*
*EDIT (again!): Yes, I know that that right there was a noobish question… But I don’t care.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help makeing me a mod on my server!

item.title: Need help makeing me a mod on my server!
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Just ctrl + f

playerRights = 3;

Then add:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE"))
				{
					playerRights = 3; 
				}

item.title: Need help makeing me a mod on my server!
item.dc:creator: @iqhacker iqhacker
item.description:
@iqhacker wrote:

First goto the directory you installed the server in…

EDIT: Hopefully you are using MoparScape v3.2

Then goto the HybridScape dir.
Then the characters dir.
Next, find your characters name and open up his file.
You will find a line that says PlayerRights (or something like that)
change it to 2 for a Global Mod, and 3 for Admin (U probably want 3)

There you go…

Read full topic
